== 2.0.3 :Jun 22th 2012 ==
  * upgrade svnkit dependency to 1.7.5

== 2.0.2 :May 30th 2012 ==
  * status command must return relative path rather than absolute.

== 2.0.1 :May 16th 2012 ==
  * use svnkit version deployed in Maven central repository

== 2.0 :April 30th 2012 ==
  *  svn 1.7 support
  * Apache Maven Scm 1.7 upgrade.

== 1.15 :December 2nd 2011 ==
  *  SvnTagCommand performs copies from remote rather than working copy (http://code.google.com/a/apache-extras.org/p/maven-scm-provider-svnjava/issues/detail?id=6)
  * Apache Maven Scm 1.6 upgrade.

== 1.14 : October 28th 2011 ==
  * upgrade to Apache Maven scm 1.5
  * include SVN revision information when executing the changelog command (http://code.google.com/a/apache-extras.org/p/maven-scm-provider-svnjava/issues/detail?id=7)
  * Unable to use release:branch with svnjava provider http://code.google.com/a/apache-extras.org/p/maven-scm-provider-svnjava/issues/detail?id=8
== 1.12 : 5 November 2010 ==

  * upgrade to last svnkit 1.3.4

  * useAuthCache ignored using javasvn provider (http://code.google.com/p/maven-scm-provider-svnjava/issues/detail?id=10)
== 1.11 : 8 August 2010 ==

  * Implements mkdir command (scm api 1.4)

== 1.10.1 : 21 May 2010 ==

  * [http://code.google.com/p/maven-scm-provider-svnjava/issues/detail?id=9] : scmCommentPrefix not used when tagging project with maven release plugin
  * [http://code.google.com/p/maven-scm-provider-svnjava/issues/detail?id=14] : <scmVersionType> and <scmVersion> don't work for checkout command.
